applicationDefinitionId.description: The fully qualified path of managed application definition Id.

parameters.description: Name and value pairs that define the managed application parameters. It can be a JObject or a well formed JSON string.

outputs.description: Name and value pairs that define the managed application outputs.

jitAccessPolicy.description: The managed application Jit access policy.

authorizations.description: The  read-only authorizations property that is retrieved from the application package.

customerSupport.description: The read-only customer support property that is retrieved from the application package.

supportUrls.description: The read-only support URLs property that is retrieved from the application package.

artifacts.description: The collection of managed application artifacts.

applicationDefinitionId.description: The fully qualified path of managed application definition Id.

parameters.description: Name and value pairs that define the managed application parameters. It can be a JObject or a well formed JSON string.

outputs.description: Name and value pairs that define the managed application outputs.

displayName.description: The managed application definition display name.

artifacts.description: The collection of managed application artifacts. The portal will use the files specified as artifacts to construct the user experience of creating a managed application from a managed application definition.

packageFileUri.description: The managed application definition package file Uri. Use this element

mainTemplate.description: The inline main template json which has resources to be provisioned. It can be a JObject or well-formed JSON string.

createUiDefinition.description: The createUiDefinition json for the backing template with Microsoft.Ai/locations/{location}/applications resource. It can be a JObject or well-formed JSON string.

managementPolicy.description: The managed application management policy that determines publisher's access to the managed resource group.

managedBy.description: ID of the resource that manages this resource.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of user assigned identity.

userAssignedResourceIdentity.description: Represents the user assigned identity that is contained within the UserAssignedIdentities dictionary on ResourceIdentity

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

value.description: The array of managed application definitions.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

ProvisioningState.description: Provisioning status of the managed application.

uri.description: The managed application artifact blob uri.

name.description: The managed application definition artifact name.

uri.description: The managed application definition artifact blob uri.

type.description: The managed application definition artifact type.

uri.description: The managed application notification endpoint uri.

parameters.description: The policy parameters.

principalId.description: The provider's principal identifier. This is the identity that the provider will use to call ARM to manage the managed application resources.

roleDefinitionId.description: The provider's role definition identifier. This role will define all the permissions that the provider must have on the managed application's container resource group. This role definition cannot have permission to delete the resource group.

resourceUsageId.description: The managed application resource usage Id.

maximumJitAccessDuration.description: The maximum duration JIT access is granted. This is an ISO8601 time period value.

value.description: The array of Jit request definition.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

principalId.description: The the principal id that will be granted JIT access.

roleDefinitionId.description: The role definition id that will be granted to the Principal.

duration.title: The required duration of the JIT request.

startTime.description: The start time of the request.

ApplicationClientDetails.description: The application client details to track the entity creating/updating the managed app resource.
